name: Akabella's Descent
description:
Akabella's Descent is a 2D Speed Running/Platformer game which takes place inside of a dark cave. You must team up with a fairy and find your way out of it as fast as possible. The fairy's light is your only defense between life and death as unknown monsters are lurking every corner and waiting for the darkness to devour you! Oh, and hurry up, the cave is collapsing in 10 min... 

Collect coins to gain a small speed boost, and race against your ghost when you die. How fast can you make it out?

***Controller Support****
